segments.text: I want to change rooms . In fact , I want a refund for tonight !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cockroaches have taken over my room !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My apologies , sir . We'll give you a new room and refund the value of your current room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I want to continue to be able to recommend this hotel to others .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We always try to serve our guests in the most agreeable way possible .
segments.speaker: S2
